author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Sujato Bhikkhu

segments.pli: “Yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā viraddhā, viraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī.
segments.en: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the seven awakening factors has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.

segments.pli: Yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, satta bojjhaṅgā āraddhā, āraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī.
segments.en: Whoever has undertaken the seven awakening factors has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.
The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

segments.pli: yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjhaṅgā viraddhā, viraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī.
segments.en: Whoever has missed out on these seven awakening factors has missed out on the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.

segments.pli: Yesaṃ kesañci, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjhaṅgā āraddhā, āraddho tesaṃ ariyo maggo sammā dukkhakkhayagāmī”ti.
segments.en: Whoever has undertaken these seven awakening factors has undertaken the noble path to the complete ending of suffering.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, whoever has missed out on the seven awakening…
